title: Sharing the Warmth
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>What’s taking you so long, Honoka... Those repairs should be finished by now...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Slowly... slowly...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re not up to something again, are you...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Boo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hyaaah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe~, did I getcha?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I was just surprised because your hands are so cold! Don’t just touch my cheeks like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You’re right~, they are cold~. Maki-chan, warm them up ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Oh, come on! First you startle me and then you go on and say stuff like that... Here, take this scarf. You’d better wrap up tight!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wow, thanks! You’re so nice, Maki-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m just taking care of you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Even so, I’m still happy, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
